Text:
Episodes 11 and 12 have English subtitles. They can be disabled in your video players options.

Episode 10 has German audio as default. You can change it to English in your media players options.

Sorry for the German one. It was the only one I could find anywhere.

Enjoy!

Episodes 11 and 12 have English subtitles that can be turned off in your media players options.

Episode 10 has German audio for default but you can change it to English audio in your media players options.

I am sorry for the German audio. It was the only one I could find anywhere.
